name: Grace

April 01 2023: Grace will host a debate at 9:00.
The debating is about whether it is proper to execute criminals or not.
The debaters include Alice, Bob, Carot, Dave, Eve, Fedo.
Alice, Bob and Carot are affirmative debaters, while Dave, Eve and Fedo are opposition debaters.

description: Grace is a teacher at Town High School.
Grace has a passion for teaching
Grace always takes care of the student
Grace majors in social science in university.

Alice, Bob and Carot are affirmative debaters, while Dave, Eve and Fedo are opposition debaters.
